name: Market Cluster Comparison - NISM V-A Prep Formats vs RegDEEP™ Series (Comparison Table Dataset)
description: A comprehensive, row-by-row comparison dataset captured from the HTML table: Online Mock Tests vs Video Courses vs YouTube Prep vs RegDEEP™ Series 2026. All cell text is preserved. Emoji indicators are replaced with schema-safe text markers: [STRONG], [PARTIAL], [WEAK].

publisher.name: Learn@Gurukul The Universal Learning Hub for GurukulOnRoad Ecosystem - Online Mock Test, eLearning, & Hindi AI Literacy

sourceOrganization.name: The National Institute of Securities Markets (NISM)

isPartOf.name: RegDEEP™ - Regulatory Decoding & Explanation for Exam Purpose™
RegDEEP™ NISM Exam Prep Series 2026 Built on Rank Separator & Assessment Intent Framework
isPartOf.description: RegDEEP™ NISM Exam Prep Series 2026 is a focused, examiner-aligned preparation series designed exclusively for NISM certification examinations. The series applies the RegDEEP™ (Regulatory Decoding & Explanation for Exam Purpose) framework to transform official NISM curricula, test objectives, and regulatory material into exam-ready understanding and defensible decision-making ability. Each title in the series trains candidates to recognize concepts accurately, differentiate near-identical provisions, and apply correct regulatory logic under ambiguity -reflecting how NISM exams are actually constructed and evaluated. This series is intended for serious learners seeking clarity, elimination skill, and consistency under exam pressure, rather than rote memorization or shortcut-based preparation.

about.name: NISM Certification Exams in Securities Market & Finance

isBasedOn.description: Aggregation of publicly available data for various courses, mock test and YouTube videos available in public domain for NISM V-A Mutual Fund Distributor Certification Exam Preparation comparing with the official test objectives outlined by NISM for 2026 exams applicable from January 2026.

text: NOTE: This comparison highlights structural preparation differences, not just format differences. Competitive regulatory exams reward judgment and elimination logic, not just content exposure. - Fetchable JSON of this comparison via GitHub Repo RegDEEP.
Legend: [STRONG] Strong; [PARTIAL] Partial / depends; [WEAK] Weak / rare
